title: Batman forever
subject_group: Literature/Comic strip characters in motion pictures
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Comic strip characters in motion pictures
description: The third film in the Batman series, based on the comic book character created by Bob Kane introduces Batman's sidekick Robin. Gotham City millionnaire Bruce Wayne (Val Kilmer) a renowned playboy who's charms attract the attention of psychologist Dr Chase Meridian (Nicole Kidman). Bruce trys to hide his alternate persona as Batman from her, as well as from his new ward acrobat Dick Grayson (Chris O'Donnell). This proves to be difficult when Two-Face (Tommy Lee Jones) and The Riddler (Jim Carrey) and their henchman try to brainwash the people of Gotham City.
